preface.title: Introduction
preface.para: This exercise will have you repair a nearly complete (toy) application. You are to work through the @Ignored test cases, activating them one-by-one, and correcting their errors. Use analysis of the code, examples, the debugger, etc. to determine the issue and correction. I have tried to quiet the logs so that most of the information is key to the problem occuring. If you want more or less output in your log -- edit the contents of the log4j.xml file in src/test/resources and your standalone.xml file in the JBoss directory.
You will be using the exercises/jaxrscs-ex-war6 project for this exercise. Please load the project as an existing Maven project prior to starting the first step.

listitem.para: "RESTful Java with JAX-RS (Animal Guide)", Bill Burke, 2009, O'Reilly, Amazon Kindle ISBN 0596158041

chapter.title: Conclusion
chapter.para: In this exercise you performed various development scenarios related to accessing JAX-RS Resource classes. Once you have all of your testMethods working -- run the integration version of the tests against JBoss.
